Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.globalBoard

Class DevelopmentCardGrid

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.globalBoard.DevelopmentCardGrid
public class DevelopmentCardGrid
extends it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
Development Card Grid. It is a grid composed by twelve decks. Each deck is associated to a specific level and type of development card.

  • Constructor Details

    • DevelopmentCardGrid

      public DevelopmentCardGrid() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Class constructor. Instantiates a new Card grid. Instantiates twelve new Decks and populates them based on type and level of the cards. It also shuffles the decks.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the JSON file is not found

  • Method Details

      public DevelopmentCard peek​(int row, int column)
      Gets the top card of the deck
      Parameters:
      row - where to find the deck
      column - where to find the deck
      Returns:
      card which is on top of the selected deck

    • pop

      public DevelopmentCard pop​(int row, int column)
      Picks the top card of the selected deck. The it removes the card from the deck and notifies the observer
      Parameters:
      row - where to find the deck
      column - where to find the deck
      Returns:
      card which is on top of the selected Deck
